channel.title: Development on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Automaly

item.title: Document Reporting Services (SSRS)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) for creating and managing business documents and reports in Dynamics 365 Finance Operations.

item.title: Using XppPrePostArgs to pass parameters through a method
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master XppPrePostArgs class in Dynamics 365 for passing parameters between pre- and post-event handlers. Practical example with CustGroup table extension and method wrapping.

item.title: How to hide New and Delete buttons (command buttons) in form
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Hide New and Delete buttons in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations forms using design properties or X++ code. Includes CoC extension examples for standard form customization.

item.title: Extend on-hand inventory entities FinOps
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Extend on-hand inventory entities in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations by adding custom fields to tables, views, and entities. Step-by-step guide for inventory integration customization.

item.title: Reservation and on-hand inventory in warehouse management
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to inventory reservation hierarchies and on-hand calculations in Dynamics 365 warehouse management. Covers reservation strategies, implementation details, and X++ APIs for WHS-enabled items.

item.title: File upload sysoperation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete X++ code examples for implementing file upload functionality in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using SysOperation framework. Supports CSV and Excel file processing with batch capabilities.

item.title: Git & Github cheatsheet
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential Git and GitHub command reference including installation, configuration, branching, merging, and submodule management for developers.

item.title: All about Odata actions in Dynamics 365 Finance And Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to creating and using OData actions in D365 Finance Operations data entities including Power Automate integration and automation scenarios.

item.title: Framework vs. Platform
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Clear explanation of the key differences between software frameworks and platforms with practical examples. Understand when to use frameworks vs platforms in development architecture decisions.

item.title: Extend the standard reports in Dynamics 365 finance and operations (CustAccountStatementExt)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial for extending standard Customer Account Statement reports in D365 Finance Operations using SSRS, COC extensions, and customization techniques.

item.title: Basic C# OOP Concept
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Simple introduction to C# object-oriented programming concepts including classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism using real-world house building analogies.

item.title: Link Type and Join Types in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive guide to Link Types (Active, Delayed, Passive) and Join Types (InnerJoin, OuterJoin, ExistJoin, NotExistJoin) in Dynamics AX 2012. Learn data source relationships and SQL query patterns.
